title: Zombie Army Trilogy v1.8.20.01 (working online!)
description:
================================================================================
Zombie Army Trilogy version 1.8.20.01 (Steam/non-Steam) ================================================================================

English/Spanish


================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
================================================================================

- Custom installer highly compressed.
- The game is updated to 1.8.20.01 version.
- Audio and text are in English and Spanish.
- It includes the libraries the game requires.
- The game can be played online (co-op mode) with or without Steam.


================================================================================
Instructions:
================================================================================

1. Run "setup.exe" file to install the game.
2. Use the shortcut placed at the Desktop by the installer.


================================================================================
FAQ:
================================================================================

Q: How can I CHANGE THE LANGUAGE of the game between English/Spanish?
A: With the file "options.cmd".

Q: Do I need STEAM to play?
A: No. Singleplayer and multiplayer work without Steam, though you can also use it. 

Q: CO-OP does not work.
A: Yes, it does, with or without Steam. Read carefully the info included within the installer and always start the game from the shortcut on the Desktop placed by the installer (which points to "options.cmd" file).


This is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.


IMPORTANT!: Always install the game with administrator privileges!
